name: Funky Flock
description:
Birds are coming out of the woodwork in Griffin park! There Moovin n’ Groovin to the sound of that sweet Funk! Play along with these Funky birds on your strange flute, match the end of their phrase with a little click of the mouse and you'll be Funkin it up in no time!

Project leads: SuaveMango & Roboson

Music: ArcitecAudio

SFX: Su5hi

Programming: colorplease, sherm & Ceceboki

Artwork: spring, Archnila & furu
